caption: Table 1: Summary of the datasets used in the experiments.
description: This table provides a summary of the characteristics of the five datasets used in the paper's experiments.  It shows the number of samples (N), the dimensionality of the data (D), and the number of classes (K) for each dataset: MNIST, Fashion MNIST, Letter Recognition, 20 Newsgroups, and Amazon Reviews.
section: Experimental Details on Datasets and Algorithms

caption: Table 1: Two principal components of each leaf in PCA tree 13, showing the words corresponding to the top 5 positive and negative entries of the Uj columns (principal components' coefficients).
description: This table shows the top 5 most positive and negative words associated with the first two principal components for each leaf node in PCA tree 13 from the Amazon Reviews dataset.  It highlights the key semantic features captured by the PCA projections within each leaf's subspace, indicating the words that contribute most strongly to the variation along each of the two principal components (PC1 and PC2). The words provide insights into the themes and characteristics of the reviews grouped within each leaf.
